title: 端口被占求大神
author: cspcsp
txt_content:
端口被占端口被占
试了好多端口都是一样的
[WARNING] **** FAILED TO BIND TO PORT!
2014-04-20 07:16:21 [WARNING] The exception was: java.net.BindException: Cannot assign requested address: JVM_Bind
2014-04-20 07:16:21 [WARNING] Perhaps a server is already running on that port?

replies.txt_content:
Perhaps a server is already running on that port?{:10_514:}
恩 的确是端口被占
试一试改端口
server.properties里面改
server-port=25565修改为其他的

replies.txt_content:
